long_description: The sturdy MagLite 2-D Cell flashlight is made with anodized aircraft aluminum for corrosion-resistance and excellent durability. Made of durable anodized aluminum with knurled, nonslip grip. Krypton bulb outputs 19 lumens and throws light up to 229m (751 ft.). Beam adjusts from spot to flood by turning head assembly. 2 D batteries (included) provide up to 10 hrs. of use. Push-button rubber switch is flush with casing to prevent accidental activation. O-ring seals keep moisture out. MagLite 2-D Cell flashlight includes 2 D alkaline batteries; also comes with a spare krypton bulb stored in the tail cap.
short_description: The sturdy MagLite 2-D Cell flashlight is made with anodized aircraft aluminum for corrosion-resistance and excellent durability.
